title: FS: 1887 N28 Allen & Ginter Joseph Mulvey PSA 2 Undergraded

posts.post_title: FS: 1887 N28 Allen & Ginter Joseph Mulvey PSA 2 Undergraded
posts.post_content:
Fresher Grade PSA 2 - Clean Back - Can't figure out the grade on this one.

Beautiful sharp card with clean registration.

$895 - Shipped Insured or Delivered at the National

PayPal, Venmo or Zelle net to me

Beautiful card! Without seeing it in hand, the grade is a head-scratcher.

Good luck with the sale!
OMG, that's a "2"?   Another grading head scratcher.

[quote name="Fred" post=2529640]OMG, that's a "2"?   Another grading head scratcher.[/QUOTE]

I can't figure it out. I honestly think they need to just let AI do grading.  At least it would be more consistent.
